title: Image caching
description: Thumbnails are currently fetched multiple times per session and across sessions. Saving (caching) a temporary copy improves responsiveness and saves bandwidth.

localizedDescription.value: Thumbnails are currently fetched multiple times per session and across sessions. Saving (caching) a temporary copy improves responsiveness and saves bandwidth.
Dezelfde foto's worden momenteel herhaardelijk opgehaald. Dit kost tijd en bandbreedte. Verhelpen door een lokale copie tijdelijk te bewaren.

title: Expositions
description: Display the images shown at club expositions. Such an image series would typically included images by multiple club members.

localizedDescription.value: Display the images shown at club expositions. Such an image series would typically included images by multiple club members.
Ondersteuning voor club exposities als beeldenreeksen, van meerdere clubleden en in een instelbare volgorde.

title: Hide/remove photo club
description: Allow hiding or unfollowing of a photo club that is no longer of interest.

localizedDescription.value: Allow simple hiding of photo clubs that the user is no longer interested in. Especially relevant if there are many clubs to choose from.
Men moet eenvoudig een fotogroep kunnen selecteren maar ook verwijderen. Vooral nuttig als de app veel clubs bevat.

title: Map improvements
description: Add names of clubs to pins on the maps of the Photo Clubs screen. Possibly add marker showing the user's location.

localizedDescription.value: Add names of clubs to pins on the maps of the Photo Clubs screen. Possibly add marker showing the user's location.
Namen van de fotogroepen bij de spelden op de kaart weergeven. Mogelijk ook huidige locatie van de gebruiker tonen.

title: Indicate portfolios that changed
description: Show (using a 'badge') when a Portfolio has been updated since user's last visit.

localizedDescription.value: Show (using a 'badge') when a Portfolio has been updated since user's last visit.
Geef visueel aan indien er foto's aan een Portfolio toegevoegd zijn.

title: Rename app
description: Change app name from Photo Club Waalre to a name that is not linked to any specific club.

localizedDescription.value: Change app name from Photo Club Waalre to a name that is not linked to any specific club.
Verander naam van de app zodat deze niet vernoemd is naar één enkele club.

title: Simple onboarding of new clubs
description: Onboarding of clubs should be made easy. This implies needing no code changes to the app itself. Instead, club membership lists and lists of images could be stored and maintained by the clubs on their own websites (e.g., Wordpress) or on simpleJsonCMS.com.

localizedDescription.value: Onboarding of clubs should be made easy. This implies needing no code changes to the app itself. Instead, club membership lists and lists of images could be stored and maintained by the clubs on their own websites (e.g., Wordpress) or on simpleJsonCMS.com.

Verlaag de drempelig om een nieuwe club toe te voegen of om clubinformatie te wijzigen. Dit zou moeten kunen zonder dat de app zelf aangepast moet worden. Dit zou kunnen als de club zelf de vereiste informatie op een eigen website kan zetten en beheren.
